DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Butterfly
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Butterfly Face Painting Brush #BRUBU is 1 inch long and is used specifically to create intricate butterfly wing designs. Snazaroo Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a yellow handle, and high-quality nylon synthetic bristles. Snazaroo synthetic brushes offer value, durability, and are easy to clean. The Snazaroo Butterfly Brush is ideal for creating butterfly wings in a hurry.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red butterfly face painting brush
Features high-quality synthetic bristles, nickel plated ferrules with a yellow handle
